:root { --accent: #4CAF50; } body { background: #121212; color: #ffffff; font-family: sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; } header { background: #1e1e1e; padding: 1rem; text-align: center; } h1 { margin: 0; } .hero { text-align: center; padding: 2rem; } #about, #skills, #projects, #contact { padding: 1rem; } .skills-grid { display: flex; gap: 1rem; } .skills-grid span { background: var(--accent); padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 0.25rem; } a:focus { outline: 2px solid var(--accent); outline-offset: 2px; } @media (prefers-reduced-motion) { * { transition: none !important; } }
// Minimal JS for interactivity if needed
